Referral-description: Create your referral link and receive 0.1 TON from each Lucky Wallet created, and your referral will receive a 0.1 TON discount upon creation.
Referral-cost: The cost of creating a referral smart contract is 0.5 TON.
Transaction is being processed. Check ba: Transaction is being processed. Check back in a few minutes.
Create-description: The cost of creating each new Lucky Wallet increases in arithmetic progression in increments of 0.005 TON. Therefore, the final creation cost may vary depending on whether containers have been created by other users at the time.
About-description: Lucky Wallet is your personal and secure smart container for storing and collecting TON, NFT and Jetton. Assets located on Lucky Wallet are managed using a specially created Mini App. The smart contract code has been verified, and the source code of the contracts is available open source in the repository on github. The smart container is made in the form of an NFT and, accordingly, it can be transferred/sold to a new owner as a regular NFT. Only the current owner of the NFT has access to the assets in the container.
